title: Perma-ban Inters
body: Inters should just be perma-banned. There's no excuse for not doing so. They just ruin people's games. Especially ranked inters. Literally just had 3 games of duo inters in ranked. But Riot: "You should be able to carry your team and climb." No, that is complete bullshit. It's an excuse for bad players to get free wins.

replies.body: They give almost everyone a second chance in League. Repeating **any** trolling behaviors results in a permanent ban.
Sounds more like the subtext is "i should be allowed to int as well to punish those inters", which is.. kind of lacking in awareness.
you dont know what inting means at first place... xD
